hall.description: You are standing in a grand hall with a glittering chandelier.

items.name: rusty key
items.description: An old, rusty key. I wonder what it opens.

library.description: Shelves of dusty books tower above you.

items.name: spellbook
items.description: A thick book filled with arcane runes.

kitchen.description: The kitchen smells of fresh bread. Pots and pans hang from the ceiling.
